mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_post, user_addr1, user_addr2, user_phone, user_email) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_post}, #{user_addr1}, #{user_addr2}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email});
mapper.update: update user set user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_post = #{user_post}, user_addr1 = #{user_addr1}, user_addr2 = #{user_addr2}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_email = #{user_email} where user_id = #{user_id}
